      #include<stdio.h>
      #include<iostream>
        #include<stdlib.h>
        #include<math.h>
        #include<string.h>
        #include<algorithm>

        using namespace std;


        int main()
        {
            int t;
            cin>>t;

            while(t--)
            {
                string str;
                cin>>str;
                if(next_permutation(str.begin(),str.end()))
                cout<<str<<"\n";
                else cout<<"no answer\n";
            }
            return 0;
        }
